text: Here are the most explosive revelations from the newly released, less redacted version of the Mueller report https://t.co/JC1lP6take

name: businessinsider
text:
RT @sonam_sheth: UPDATE: Geoffrey Berman says he has "no intention" of resigning after Barr tried to oust him. 

Berman adds that he'll step down when the Senate confirms a successor, but "until then, our investigations will move forward without delay or interruption." 

https://t.co/jKcUUtIvnh
